This is a [geopumber](https://github.com/ATFutures/geoplumber) app. That means it is an R powered backend API (think Flask in Python) and a ReactJS front end.

To build, from an R console:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(geoplumber)
gp_build()
```

and run
```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(geoplumber)
gp_plumb()
```

visit `localhost:8000`

## deploy with docker
Repo contains Dockerfile for production.
